title: Grab a free copy of FlatOut during the GOG Love at First Pixel sale
description: GOG are running their own little Valentine's Day promotion with the Love at First Pixel sale, plus you can grab a free copy of FlatOut.

title: Cultist Simulator gets much improved Steam Deck support
description: Cultist Simulator was already Steam Deck Verified with Native Linux support but Weather Factory have put out a brand new update, which aims to improve it even further.

title: Paradox confirm no Linux support for Prison Architect 2 but investigating Steam Deck
description: Prison Architect 2 from Double Eleven and Paradox Interactive was recently revealed with an entirely new look, and while the original has full Native Linux support, the sequel will not.

title: Check out the demo for Silence of the Siren a rich sci-fi strategy game
description: From the same team that created Project Hospital, the next game from Oxymoron Games is a sci-fi strategy game called Silence of the Siren and there's now a public demo you can try.

title: DOSBox Staging 0.81.0 out now with new CRT shaders and lots of graphics improvements
description: DOSBox Staging is a modern continuation of DOSBox with advanced features and modern development practices, giving you the great compatibility of classic games with plenty of extras. A new release is available with DOSBox Staging 0.81.0 and it brings with it quite a number of changes to improve a whole lot of games.

title: Steam Next Fest 2024 was the biggest for Valve and game devs yet
description: Valve announced the top 50 most played game demos from Steam Next Fest 2024, and as it turns out this was the biggest Steam Next Fest event Valve has run so far.

title: Fortune Avenue is a new take on a Monopoly-like experience
description: Binogure Studio (City Game Studio) recently announced Fortune Avenue, their own take on a Monopoly-like experience that will enter Early Access this year.

title: Celebrate Valentine's Day with this Bloody Sale
description: Whether we're celebrating with loved ones or just staying home alone, Valentines Day is a special day.
